name: license
description: license that comes with the data

name: carob_contributor
description: name(s) of contributers of this script

name: data_type
description: what kind of data is this (e.g. experiment, survey, compilation)

name: publication
description: the doi of the associated publication (if any)

name: data_institutions
description: organizational home(s) of the data providers

name: project
description: project that this dataset belongs to (if any)

name: carob_date
description: date of first contribution to Carob

name: revised_by
description: name(s) of contributers who made significant changes
